author: Nathan Neil
title: Purple Deck Announces MobileDeck Launch
text:
MobileDeck, a new public app builder, will allow users to create a powerful, interactive application at an attractive price point, allowing even novice users the ability to create an app quickly and easily. MobileDeck is an online mobile application creator that enables fast publication of native applications for both iOS and Android platforms. The client can design a custom app using pre-built MobileDeck modules with no programming experience required. MobileDeck is designed to simplify pushing content to customers, and provides custom content management solutions as well as integrations with 3rd parties. You can see how customers are using these modules to deliver business value across different verticals by clicking through the industry tours at https://www.purpledeck.com/products/mobiledeck . The prebuilt modules for MobileDeck allow publishing of news, events, coupons, product listings, social media status, and also integrate with hardware devices for geofencing and iBeacon behaviors.
A major benefit of MobileDeck over traditional development is that clients can publish updates to the app content instantly, at any time. Some of the existing modules are News, Events, Sports Schedule, Map/Directions, Twitter, Flickr, Instagram, YouTube, SoundCloud, Products, Cars, Menu, Coupons, Real Estate. When a client is ready, the team at Purple Deck handles publication of the app to the various app stores. The client does not need any special technical knowledge to build, release, or update the applications. MobileDeck also provides detailed analytics of customer usage, allowing clients to test engagement through different marketing campaigns.
The cost for a MobileDeck launch is $500 for the app set-up and only $99/month management fee.
About Purple Deck, Inc:, Located on the beautiful Scotland Campus, Purple Deck is a Pennsylvania Community ImPAct Award Finalist and Pennsylvania BIG Idea Competition finalist.
